origin.moborigins.snowgolem.name: Snow Golem
origin.moborigins.snowgolem.description: Golems made from snow, and weak to anything that might melt them
power.moborigins.heat_weakness.name: Heat Weakness
power.moborigins.heat_weakness.descripti: You take damage over time in hot biomes
power.moborigins.greater_golems.name: Greater Golems
power.moborigins.greater_golems.descript: Snow Golems you make are more powerful
power.moborigins.stronger_snowballs.name: Stronger Snowballs
power.moborigins.stronger_snowballs.desc: Snowballs you throw are packed with ice, and deal 1 damage!
power.moborigins.snow_trail.name: Snow Trail
power.moborigins.snow_trail.description: You leave a trail of snow.
power.moborigins.frigid_strength.name: Frigid Strength
power.moborigins.frigid_strength.descrip: Deal more damage in cold areas.
origin.moborigins.witch.name: Witch
origin.moborigins.witch.description: Cruel and cackling, Witches are masters of brewing, and are great with magic
power.moborigins.potion_action.name: Perfect Potion
power.moborigins.potion_action.descripti: Get a random potion effect, based on the situation you are in.
power.moborigins.pillager_aligned.name: Pillager Aligned
power.moborigins.pillager_aligned.descri: Villagers don't like you, and pillagers like you!
power.moborigins.better_potions.name: Better Potions
power.moborigins.better_potions.descript: You consume potions better than most, Potions will last longer when you drink them.
origin.moborigins.strider.name: Strider
origin.moborigins.strider.description: Travel the vast oceans of lava with the speed of a strider
power.moborigins.lava_walk.name: Lava Walker
power.moborigins.lava_walk.description: You have the ability to walk on lava source blocks!
power.moborigins.lava_speed.name: Lava Adept
power.moborigins.lava_speed.description: You get speed II while on lava, but slowness I when not on it.
power.moborigins.rideable_creature.name: Rideable Creature
origin.moborigins.evoker.name: Evoker
origin.moborigins.evoker.description: Master of Magic, and a collector of Totems.
power.moborigins.summon_fangs.name: Summon Fangs
power.moborigins.summon_fangs.descriptio: You gain the ability to summon fangs!
power.moborigins.lower_totem_chance.name: Arcane Totems
power.moborigins.lower_totem_chance.desc: Totems have a 10% not to break on use
origin.moborigins.guardian.name: Guardian
origin.moborigins.guardian.description: Master of Magic, and a collector of Totems.
power.moborigins.guardian_spikes.name: Guardian Spikes
power.moborigins.guardian_spikes.descrip: Spikes that have a chance to damage attackers!
power.moborigins.monument_spawn.name: Monument Home
power.moborigins.monument_spawn.descript: You spawn at a Ocean Monument
origin.moborigins.slime.name: Slime
origin.moborigins.slime.description: Green blobs of Jello, that bounce all around!
power.moborigins.bouncy.name: Bouncy
power.moborigins.bouncy.description: All blocks act like slime blocks
power.moborigins.split.name: Split Ability
power.moborigins.split.description: Turn your food points into a small slime to defend you!
origin.moborigins.wolf.name: Wolf
origin.moborigins.wolf.description: Strong and Fast, Wolves are creatures that have strength in numbers.
power.moborigins.alpha_wolf.name: Alpha Wolf
power.moborigins.full_moon.name: Werewolf-like
power.moborigins.full_moon.description: During a full moon, you get Faster, Stronger, and Healthier
power.moborigins.wolf_body.name: Wolf Body
power.moborigins.wolf_body.description: You have 2 less hearts of health than humans.
